CustomField.formula:
IMAGE('http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chxt=x,y&chxl=1:|Open|Closed Won|0:|0|50000|'+ TEXT(1.5 * MAX( Closed_Won_Value__c , Open_Oppty_Value__c )) +'&cht=bhs&chd=t:'+TEXT( Open_Oppty_Value__c )+','+TEXT( Closed_Won_Value__c )+'&chds=0,'+ TEXT(1.5 * MAX( Closed_Won_Value__c , Open_Oppty_Value__c )) +'&chco=236FBD&chls=2.0&chs=300x125&chtt=Opportunity Value ($USD)'
, 'no data available')
CustomField.label: Open vs. Closed Won Opportunities
